message: Identified 21 MCP tools in real_mcp_server.py including task management, agent deployment, phase control, health monitoring, and review systems
Completed full analysis of orchestrator data structures - documented all JSON schemas and identified dashboard requirements

registry_formats: AGENT_REGISTRY.json - task-level registry with agents and phases
GLOBAL_REGISTRY.json - system-wide registry tracking all tasks
log_formats: stream JSONL - full agent logs with tool calls
